aria-label.description: Adds accessible text to the Accordion content

aria-labelledby.description: Id of the controlling accordion toggle to label the content.

children.description: Content rendered inside the Accordion (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the Accordion content

component.description: Component to use as content container (Type: React.ElementType)

contentBodyProps.description: Props passed to the AccordionExpandableContentBody * (Type: AccordionExpandableContentBodyProps)

isCustomContent.description: Flag indicating content is custom. Expanded content Body wrapper will be removed from children.  This allows multiple bodies to be rendered as content. (React component or element)

isFixed.description: Flag to indicate Accordion content is fixed
